column2: "Nna aka nda ebien ma apaho nye epitsi afahyɛ no edu; na asɔfompanyin nye kyerɛwfo no hwehwɛɛ mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ nam nyansa mu akyer Jesus na woeku no:"
"na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ afahyɛ mu bi a
column4: amma wentwiwentwi aammba ɔman no mu."

column2: "Na ɔwɔ Bɛtani Simon kwatanyi no fie
column3: na ɔtse edzidzi no
column4: ɔbaa bi baa hɔ a ɔdze alabastron toa a nard ngohuam a ɔsom bo wɔ mu; na ɔbɔɔ toa no na ohuei guu n'etsifi."

column2: "Na binom wɔ hɔ a wonyaa ebufuw wɔ hɔn mu
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze ntsi na wɔresɛɛ ngohuam yi?"

column2: "Nkyɛ wobotum atɔn ngohuam yi agye bɔbor sika denare ahaasa na wɔdze ama ehiafo. Na wohwinhwinii tsiaa no."
"Na Jesus see dɛ
column3: Hom ngyaa no; ebɛnadze ntsi na hom rehaw no? Ɔayɛ edwuma pa wɔ mo ho."

column2: "Na hom wɔ ehiafo wɔ hom nkyɛn daa
column3: na aber biara a hom pɛ

column2: "Ɔayɛ dza obotum: oedzi kan abɛsera me nyimpadua akɔ sie mu."
"Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: Beebiara a wɔbɛka asɛmpa yi wɔ wiadze nyina mu no
column4: dza ɔbaa yi ayɛ so wɔbɛka dze ayɛ ne nkaa."

column2: "Na Judas Iskariot a ɔyɛ duebien no mu baako fii hɔ kɔr asɔfompanyin no nkyɛn dɛ obeyi Jesus ama hɔn."
"Na wɔtsee no
column3: ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛw
column4: na wɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ wɔbɛma no sika. Na ɔhwehwɛɛ mbrɛ obesi eyi no ama wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu."

column2: "Na epitsi da a odzi kan a woku apahoguan no
column3: n'esuafo no see no dɛ
column4: Hen na epɛ dɛ yekesiesie ma ikedzi apaho no?"

column2: "Na ɔsomaa n'esuafo no mu beenu
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: na nyimpa bi a ɔso nsuhina behyia hom: hom nka no do;"

column2: "na beebiara a ɔbɛhɛn no hom nse ofiwura no dɛ
column3: Kyerɛkyerɛfo no se
column4: M'ahɔhodan a menye m'esuafo bedzi mu apaho no wɔ hen?"

column2: "Na ɔnoara ɔbɛkyerɛ hom sordan kɛse bi a wɔahyehyɛ mu
column3: na woesiesie mu; hɔ na hom nsiesie mma hɛn."

column2: "Na esuafo no sii mu kɔree
column3: na wɔbaa kurow no mu na wobohun dɛ mbrɛ ɔsee hɔn no

column2: "Na odur ewimbir no
column3: ɔnye duebien no bae."

column2: "Na wɔtwetwer hɔ ridzidzi no
column3: Jesus see dɛ
column5: Hom mu baako a ɔnye me dzidzi na obeyi me ama."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn awerɛhow na wɔhyɛɛ ase nkorkor bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ana emi a?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Duebien no mu baako a ɔnye me to nsa wɔ ɔsɛn no mu no a."

column2: "Na nyimpa Ba no rokɔ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw wɔ no ho; naaso nyimpa a wɔnam no do beyi nyimpa Ba no ama no ndue! Sɛ wɔannwo dɛm nyimpa no a

column2: "Na woridzidzi no
column3: ɔfaa paanoo na ohyiraa do na obubui
column4: na ɔdze maa hɔn; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Hom ngye: iyi nye me nyimpadua."

column2: "Na ɔfaa kɔɔpow na ɔdaa ase no
column3: ɔdze maa hɔn ma hɔn nyina nomee."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Iyi nye mo bɔgyaa a ɔyɛ ahyɛmu     no a dodowara ntsi woruhue egu no."
column4: "#Eks 24.8; Jer 31.31-34 #14.24: Akyerɛwfo binom dze fofor sɔw ahyɛmu no do."

column2: "Nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: moronnom wenyinaba no bi bio
column4: dze ekodu da a mobɔnom no fofor wɔ Nyankopɔn ahenman no mu."

column2: "Na wɔtoow ndwom no
column3: wofiir edzi kɔr Ngo Bepɔw no do."

column2: "Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Wɔbɔto hom nyina fintsidua: na wɔakyerɛw dɛ

column2: "Naaso mo wusoɛr ekyir no mibedzi hom enyim akɔ Galilii."
"Na Peter see no dɛ
column3: Sɛ wɔbɔto hɔn nyina fintsidua mpo a

column2: "Na Jesus see no dɛ
column3: Nokwar mese wo dɛ

column2: "Na Peter dze
column3: mbom ɔkaa no enyiberdo dɛ
column4: Sɛ menye wo bowu mpo a
column5: meremmpa wo da; na dɛmara na hɔn nyina so kae."

column2: "Na wodur beebi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Getsemane; na ɔsee n'esuafo no dɛ
column3: Hom ntsena ha ma monkɔsɔr."

column2: "Na ɔfaa Peter nye James nye John kaa noho
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ ase bɔɔ hu na ɔbɔmee."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Awerɛhow ahyɛ me kra do dze kɔ owu mu: hom ntsena ha

column2: "Na ɔkɔr enyim kakra
column3: na ɔkɔhwee famu na ɔsɔɔr dɛ
column5: dɔn no mpa no ho nkɔ."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Aba
column4: Egya! Adze biara nnso wo yɛ: yi kɔɔpow yi pa mo ho; naaso nnyɛ dza mepɛ bi a

column2: "Na ɔbae bohun dɛ wɔdeda
column3: na ɔsee Peter dɛ
column5: ana ada? Ana enntum annweɔn dɔnhwer kor mpo?"

column2: "Hom nweɔn na hom nsɔr
column3: amma hom aannkɔ nsɔhwɛ mu: sunsum no pɛ dze

column2: "Na osii mu kɔr bio
column3: na ɔkɔsɔree kaa asɛm kor no ara."

column2: "Na ɔsanee bae bohun hɔn dɛ wɔdeda bio
column3: na hɔn enyiwa akom; na woennya mbuae bi amma no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa ne mpɛn ebiasa
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: na hom nhom. Ayɛ yie! Dɔn no edu; hwɛ
column6: woriyi nyimpa Ba no ahyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo nsa."

column2: "Hom nsoɛr ma yɛnkɔ; hwɛ
column3: nyia oriyi me ama no abɛn."

column2: "Na hɔnara
column3: ɔda do rekasa no
column4: Judas a ɔyɛ duebien no mu baako bae
column5: na nyimpadodow a wɔdzedze nkrantsee nye mpɔtsibaa fi asɔfompanyin nye kyerɛwfo nye mpanyimfo no hɔ ka no ho."

column2: "Na nyia oyii no mae no maa hɔn asɛnkyerɛdze dɛ
column3: Nyia mebɛfew n'ano no
column4: nye ɔno: hom nkyer no na hom nsuo no mu yie mfa no nkɔ."

column2: "Na odur hɔ no
column3: ntsɛmara na ɔbaa Jesus nkyɛn na ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn nsa susuoo no mu na wɔkyekyeer no."
"Na hɔn a wogyinagyina hɔ no mu baako twee ne krantsee bɔɔ ɔsɔfopanyin n'akowaa twaa n'aso."
"Na Jesus buae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ana hom firii baa mo do dɛ hom reba owifo do
column4: na hom dze nkrantsee nye mpɔtsibaa rebɛkyer me yi?"

column2: "Daa mowɔ hom nkyɛn wɔ asɔrfi mu kyerɛkyerɛe no
column3: hom annkyer me; na dɛ kyerɛwsɛm no bɛba mu ntsi a."

column2: "Na esuafo no nyinara gyaa no hɔ
column3: na woguanee."

column2: "Na aberantsɛ baako bi kaa no do a nna oetu ndwera akata n'adagyaw do; na wɔkyeer no;"
"na ogyaa ndwera no hɔ na ɔdze adagyaw guanee."
"Na wɔdze Jesus kɔr ɔsɔfopanyin no hɔ; na asɔfompanyin nye mpanyimfo nye kyerɛwfo no nyina behyiaa ne nkyɛn."
"Na Peter dzii n'ekyir wɔ ekyirekyir dze kodur ɔsɔfopanyin n'abanguado
column3: na ɔnye asomfo no kɛtsenaa hɔ too gya."

column2: "Na asɔfompanyin nye baguafo no nyina hwehwɛɛ dɛ wobenya Jesus ho dase bi dze eeku no; naaso woennya bi."
"Na dodowara gyee no ho dasewia
column3: na hɔn dasee annsaa."

column2: "Na binom soɛree gyee no ho dasewia dɛ
column5: Mubodwuruw asɔrdan a wɔdze nsa ayɛ yi na ndaansa mu matow bi a wɔammfa nsa annyɛ."

column2: "Na dɛm no mpo so hɔn dasee annsaa."
"Na ɔsɔfopanyin no gyinaa finimfin na obisaa Jesus dɛ
column3: Immbua bi? Ebɛnadze na yinom regye wo ho dase yi?"

column2: "Na omuaa n'ano
column3: na oemmbua bi. Na ɔsɔfopanyin no bisaa no bio dɛ
column5: nyia woehyira no no ne Ba no?"

column2: "Na Jesus see dɛ
column3: Emi nye no: na hom bohu nyimpa Ba no dɛ ɔtse tum no abanyimfa
column4: na ɔreba wɔ sor nsuwusiw mu."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfopanyin no sunsuaan n'atar mu
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ebɛn hia na ohia hɛn adasefo bio?"

column2: "Hom atse ebususɛm no: hom dwen dɛn? Na hɔn nyinara buu no fɔ dɛ ɔsɛ owu."
"Na binom hyɛɛ ase hinaa ntafi guu no do
column3: na wɔkataa n'enyi
column6: Hyɛ nkɔm! Na asomfo no bobɔɔ no asotɔr."

column2: "Na Peter wɔ ase wɔ abangua no do hɔ no
column3: ɔsɔfopanyin ne mbaawa no mu baako bae
column5: "na ohun Peter dɛ ɔroto gya no
column6: ɔhwɛɛ no dzinn na ɔsee no dɛ
column7: Ɔwo so nye Nazarɛtnyi Jesus nam."

column2: "Na ɔsaan dɛ
column3: Minnyim no
column4: eso menntse dza ereka yi ase mpo. Na ofiir edzi kɔr paado; na akokɔ bɔnee."

column2: "Na abaawa no hun no na ɔhyɛɛ ase see hɔn a wogyina hɔ no dɛ
column3: Oyi so fi hɔn mu."

column2: "Na ɔsaan bio. Na ɔkyɛɛr kakra no
column3: hɔn a wogyina hɔ no see Peter bio dɛ

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii nsew na ɔkekaa ntam dɛ
column3: Minnyim nyimpa yi a hom reka no ho asɛm yi."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara na akokɔ bɔɔn ne mpɛn ebien. Na Peter kaa asɛm no a Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ no no dɛ
column3: Ansaana akokɔ bɔbɔn mprɛnu no
column4: ebɛpa me mprɛnsa. Na ɔhyɛɛ ase sui."
